trans-unit.source: To finish the task of authorization, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload method.
trans-unit.target: Per completare l'attività di autorizzazione, viene chiamato il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>overload di metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control being checked for authorization.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o un altro controllo server viene verificata l'autorizzazione.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether webPart can be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se webPart possono essere aggiunti a una pagina.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Carries out the final steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: Esegue i passaggi finali della determinazione delle autorizzazioni di un controllo da aggiungere a una pagina.

trans-unit.source: The IsAuthorized overload method carries out the final steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di overload IsAuthorized esegue i passaggi finali della determinazione delle autorizzazioni di un controllo da aggiungere a una pagina.

trans-unit.source: The method ensures that `type` is a valid type, and that `path` has a value only if the control being checked is a user control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo assicura che `type` è un tipo valido e che `path` ha un valore solo se il controllo viene verificato è un controllo utente.

trans-unit.source: Then it calls the critical <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnAuthorizeWebPart%2A> method, which raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato critici <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnAuthorizeWebPart%2A>metodo, che genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnAuthorizeWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the control being checked for authorization.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>del controllo viene verificato l'autorizzazione.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The relative application path to the source file for the control being authorized, if the control is a user control.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso relativo dell'applicazione al file di origine per il controllo di autorizzazione, se il controllo è un controllo utente.

trans-unit.source: An arbitrary string value assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, used to authorize whether a control can be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: È assegnato un valore di stringa arbitraria di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>proprietà di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo, utilizzato per verificare se un controllo può essere aggiunto a una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the control being checked for authorization is a shared control, meaning that it is visible to many or all users of the application, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*> property value is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se il controllo viene verificato l'autorizzazione è un controllo condiviso, vale a dire che è visibile a tutti gli utenti dell'applicazione e il relativo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>proprietà è impostato su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se un controllo è autorizzato a essere aggiunto a una pagina.

trans-unit.source: type is .
trans-unit.target: typeis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization changes have been made that affect page-level personalization details controlled by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se sono state apportate modifiche di personalizzazione che hanno effetto sui dettagli di personalizzazione a livello di pagina applicando il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty property internally to track whether any of the page-level personalization data that it manages has changed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo utilizza la proprietà IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty internamente per rilevare se i dati di personalizzazione a livello di pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The personalization data changes when users carry out various personalization actions at the page level, such as adding or removing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, connecting or disconnecting controls, changing the page's layout by moving controls, and other actions.
trans-unit.target: I dati di personalizzazione viene modificato quando gli utenti eseguono azioni a livello di pagina, ad esempio aggiungendo o rimuovendo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, la connessione o disconnessione di controlli, la modifica del layout della pagina spostando i controlli e altre azioni.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Users can also perform personalization at the control level, which means that they make personalization changes to a specific control, and the changes affect only that control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Gli utenti possono anche eseguire la personalizzazione a livello di controllo, ovvero apportare modifiche di personalizzazione di un controllo specifico e le modifiche interessano solo il controllo.

trans-unit.source: An example would be editing the control and changing its title text, or its background color.
trans-unit.target: Un esempio la modifica del controllo e modifica il testo del titolo o il colore di sfondo.

trans-unit.source: Control-level personalization does not affect the page-level personalization data tracked by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, and so the IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty property value is not changed to `true` when control-level personalization occurs.
trans-unit.target: Personalizzazione a livello di controllo non interessano i dati di personalizzazione a livello di pagina rilevati dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>(controllo), e il valore della proprietà IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty non è stato modificato in `true` quando si verifica la personalizzazione a livello di controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Although the method is protected and cannot be accessed directly by a caller, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23IsDirty%2A> property can be accessed directly by callers, and it returns the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Anche se il metodo è protetto e non essere accessibile direttamente da un chiamante, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23IsDirty%2A>proprietà è accessibile direttamente dai chiamanti, e restituisce il valore di questa proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23IsDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether personalization changes have been made.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se sono state apportate modifiche di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads control state data that was saved from a previous page request, and needs to be restored on a subsequent request.
trans-unit.target: Carica controllare i dati di stato che è stati salvati da una richiesta di pagina precedente e devono essere ripristinato su una richiesta successiva.

trans-unit.source: The LoadControlState method is helpful for restoring property data that should be persisted across postbacks of a page, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo è utile per ripristinare i dati della proprietà che devono essere mantenuti durante i postback della pagina e di LoadControlState anche quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>è impostata su `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Contains the persisted state data to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Contiene i dati dello stato persistente da caricare.

trans-unit.source: savedState is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: savedStatenon è un valido .

trans-unit.source: Stores the custom personalization data that has been passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control by the personalization objects to be used later during the initialization process.
trans-unit.target: Archivia i dati di personalizzazione che sono stati passati al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo dagli oggetti di personalizzazione da utilizzare in un secondo momento durante il processo di inizializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The LoadCustomPersonalizationState method provides saved state data in the form of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo LoadCustomPersonalizationState fornisce i dati di stato salvato nel formato di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>

trans-unit.source: This data is eventually used to load personalization data into the Web Parts controls and to perform other initialization tasks.
trans-unit.target: Questi dati viene utilizzati per caricare i dati di personalizzazione nei controlli Web part ed eseguire altre attività di inizializzazione.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is called by a sequence of methods that begins when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.TrackViewState%2A> method initially requests the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object to supply personalization data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questo metodo viene chiamato da una sequenza di metodi che inizia quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.TrackViewState%2A>metodo richiede inizialmente associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>oggetto per fornire i dati sulla personalizzazione di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.TrackViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: È possibile chiamare questo metodo direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: You can, however, directly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23Load%2A> method, which itself calls the LoadCustomPersonalizationState method and returns the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile chiamare direttamente il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23Load%2A>(metodo), che a sua volta chiama il metodo LoadCustomPersonalizationState e restituisce i dati di personalizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> that contains the state data to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"> </xref> che contiene i dati dello stato da caricare.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object that allows only <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref> permission and <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref> permission.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> oggetto che consente solo <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"> </xref> autorizzazione e <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"> </xref> autorizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> object that is returned by this property is used during import for type deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>oggetto restituito da questa proprietà viene utilizzata durante l'importazione per la deserializzazione di tipo.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object that allows only <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref> permission and <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref> permission.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> oggetto che consente solo <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"> </xref> autorizzazione e <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"> </xref> autorizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object that allows only <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref> permission and <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref> permission.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> oggetto che consente solo <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"> </xref> autorizzazione e <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"> </xref> autorizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> object returned by this property is used during import for everything except type deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>oggetto restituito da questa proprietà viene utilizzata durante l'importazione per tutte le funzioni ad eccezione del fatto digitare la deserializzazione.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object that allows only <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref> permission and <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref> permission.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> oggetto che consente solo <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"> </xref> autorizzazione e <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"> </xref> autorizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Moves a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control from one <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone to another, or to a new position within the same zone.
trans-unit.target: Sposta un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o controllo del server da una <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona a un'altra, o una nuova posizione all'interno della stessa area.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the MoveWebPart method to move `webPart` to a new location in the same zone, or in a different zone.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo utilizza il metodo MoveWebPart per spostare `webPart` in una nuova posizione nella stessa area o in un'area diversa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: You can call this method directly from code, and it is also invoked when a user moves a control to a new position using various options in the Web Parts user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: È possibile chiamare questo metodo direttamente dal codice e viene anche richiamato quando un utente si sposta un controllo in una nuova posizione utilizzando diverse opzioni nell'interfaccia utente Web part (UI).

trans-unit.source: A number of conditions must be met before `webPart` can be moved, and most of these are indicated by items listed in the Exceptions section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: Una serie di condizioni deve essere soddisfatti prima `webPart` possono essere spostati, e la maggior parte di questi elementi sono indicata da elementi elencati nella sezione eccezioni di questo argomento.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` was not contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone to begin with, it cannot be moved into a zone.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` non è contenuto un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona prima di tutto, non può essere spostato in una zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: After the conditions have been met, the following sequence of actions occurs to move `webPart`: 1.
trans-unit.target: Le condizioni, la sequenza di azioni seguente si verifica per spostare `webPart`: 1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A>metodo genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A>

trans-unit.source: `webPart` is removed from its current zone (if necessary), and added to its new zone or new position within its current zone.
trans-unit.target: `webPart`viene rimosso dall'area corrente (se necessario) e aggiunto alla nuova area o nella nuova posizione all'interno della relativa area.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoved%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoved%2A>metodo genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoved%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `zoneIndex` of every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in both the origin and destination zones is reset to reflect the moved control.
trans-unit.target: Il `zoneIndex` di ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo nelle aree di origine e di destinazione viene reimpostato per riflettere lo spostamento del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control being moved.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o un altro controllo server viene spostato.

trans-unit.source: The target <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> to which `webPart` is being moved.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> a cui `webPart` è stato spostato.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the index of `webPart` relative to other controls within `zone`.
trans-unit.target: Un numero intero che indica l'indice di `webPart` relazione ad altri controlli all'interno di `zone`.

trans-unit.source: webPart or zone is .
trans-unit.target: webPartor zone is .

trans-unit.source: zoneIndex is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: zoneIndexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart"></xref> event and invokes a handler for the event, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart"> </xref> evento e richiama un gestore per l'evento, se presente.

trans-unit.source: The OnAuthorizeWebPart method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method, when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being checked for authorization to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato il metodo OnAuthorizeWebPart dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>(metodo), quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo viene eseguita la verifica per l'autorizzazione da aggiungere a una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the OnAuthorizeWebPart method is called, it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event, and if there is a handler method for the event, it invokes the handler.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene chiamato il metodo OnAuthorizeWebPart, genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>evento, e se è presente un metodo del gestore per l'evento, richiama il gestore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The process of authorizing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is an important Web Parts feature.
trans-unit.target: Il processo di autorizzazione <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli è un'importante funzionalità Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control that is added to a zone by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control goes through an authorization process to determine whether the control can be added.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o controllo server che viene aggiunto a una zona dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo passa attraverso un processo di autorizzazione per determinare se il controllo può essere aggiunto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: By default, the Web Parts control set does not provide any filtering criteria to prevent controls from being added to a zone.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il set di controlli Web part non fornisce i criteri di filtro per impedire l'aggiunta a una zona di controlli.

trans-unit.source: But the control set does provide the mechanisms necessary for developers to create their own filtering criteria.
trans-unit.target: Ma il set di controlli forniscono i meccanismi necessari agli sviluppatori di creare i propri criteri di filtro.

trans-unit.source: By using these mechanisms, you can create custom filtering scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Tramite questi meccanismi, è possibile creare scenari di applicazione di filtri personalizzati.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create a filter so that, if a user is in an administrator role, certain controls would be added to a zone when the page is rendered, and if the user is in a user role, those controls would not be added.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile creare un filtro in modo che, se un utente è un ruolo di amministratore, alcuni controlli verrebbero aggiunto a un'area quando viene eseguito il rendering della pagina e se l'utente è in un ruolo utente, non sarebbe possibile aggiungere tali controlli.

trans-unit.source: The mechanisms for filtering controls during the authorization process are the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> and OnAuthorizeWebPart methods, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: I meccanismi per filtrare i controlli durante il processo di autorizzazione sono il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>e OnAuthorizeWebPart metodi e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>evento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a filtering scenario, there are essentially two tasks.
trans-unit.target: Per creare un filtro, sono disponibili essenzialmente due attività.

trans-unit.source: First, you assign strings to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control you want to filter.
trans-unit.target: In primo luogo, si devono assegnare stringhe per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo che si desidera filtrare.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: These string values can be arbitrary, but they should contain the criteria you want to filter on.
trans-unit.target: Questi valori stringa possono essere arbitrari, ma devono contenere i criteri che si desidera filtrare.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted a given control to be added to a zone only if an administrator user is viewing the page, then you might assign a string value of `admin` to the property.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si desidera un determinato controllo utente da aggiungere a un'area solo se un amministratore visualizza la pagina, quindi è possibile assegnare un valore stringa `admin` alla proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Then you could use the ASP.NET roles feature, and add all users of your site to various roles such as administrator, manager, and user.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile utilizzare la funzionalità di ruoli ASP.NET e aggiungere tutti gli utenti del sito per ruoli diversi, ad esempio amministratore, manager e utente.

trans-unit.source: When a page is loading, your filtering code would check what role a user is in, compare it to the authorization filter value on a control being checked, and if (for example) the user is in an administrator role and you had set the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> value to `admin`, the control could be added.
trans-unit.target: Verificare il ruolo di un utente durante il caricamento di una pagina, il codice di filtro, confrontarlo con il valore di filtro di autorizzazione su un controllo viene selezionato e se, ad esempio, l'utente è un ruolo di amministratore e impostare il controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>valore `admin`, il controllo può essere aggiunto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The second step in creating a filtering scenario is to write code to check the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property values on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and determine whether each control is authorized before it is added to its zone.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo passaggio nella creazione di un filtro consiste nello scrivere codice per verificare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>i valori delle proprietà in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Controlla e determinare se è autorizzata ogni controllo prima di essere aggiunto alla relativa zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are two options for where to place this filtering code.
trans-unit.target: Sono disponibili due opzioni per la posizione in cui inserire il codice di filtro.

trans-unit.source: The first option is the preferred option for page developers.
trans-unit.target: La prima opzione è l'opzione preferita per gli sviluppatori di pagine.

trans-unit.source: You can create a method to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event directly in the Web page server script code, or in a code separation file.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare un metodo per gestire il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>evento direttamente nel codice di script server della pagina Web o in un file di separazione del codice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>

trans-unit.source: Associate your method with the event by adding the `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute to the tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the page, as shown in the following sample markup code.
trans-unit.target: Associare il metodo con l'evento mediante l'aggiunta di `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attributo al tag per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllare nella pagina, come illustrato nel seguente codice di markup di esempio.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: ``` <asp:webpartmanager id="manager1" runat="server" OnAuthorizeWebPart="manager1_AuthorizeWebPart" /> ``` All your custom method has to do is check each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control for the filtering criteria and then, based on the results, assign a Boolean value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs.IsAuthorized%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs> object to indicate whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be added.
trans-unit.target: ``` <asp:webpartmanager id="manager1" runat="server" OnAuthorizeWebPart="manager1_AuthorizeWebPart" /> ```Il metodo personalizzato dovrà è controllare ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo per i criteri di filtro e quindi, in base ai risultati, assegnare un valore booleano per la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs.IsAuthorized%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs>oggetto per indicare se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo può essere aggiunto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs.IsAuthorized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The code in the Example section demonstrates how to do this.
trans-unit.target: Il codice nella sezione esempio illustra come eseguire questa operazione.

trans-unit.source: The second option for where to place your filtering code is to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, and override a method to check the filter criteria.
trans-unit.target: La seconda opzione per la posizione in cui inserire il codice dell'applicazione di filtri è da cui ereditare la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe ed eseguire l'override di un metodo per controllare i criteri di filtro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The two methods you can override to do this are the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> method or the OnAuthorizeWebPart method.
trans-unit.target: I due metodi è possibile eseguire l'override per questo scopo sono il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>metodo o il metodo OnAuthorizeWebPart.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Although either method would work, in most cases it is preferable to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method, because it provides you with greater programmatic control over the whole authorization process, whereas the OnAuthorizeWebPart method does only one specific task, which is to raise the event and check for a handler.
trans-unit.target: Anche se dei metodi funzionerà, nella maggior parte dei casi è preferibile eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>metodo, perché consente un maggiore controllo a livello di codice tramite il processo di autorizzazione intero, mentre il metodo OnAuthorizeWebPart esegue solo un'attività specifica, che consiste nel generare l'evento e il controllo per un gestore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a code example of a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload of the method.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di codice di un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>che esegue l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>metodo, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>overload del metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated"></xref> event to indicate that a page and its controls are loaded, and connections on the page have been activated to begin sharing data.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated"> </xref> evento per indicare che una pagina e i relativi controlli vengono caricati e attivazione delle connessioni nella pagina per avviare la condivisione di dati.

trans-unit.source: The OnConnectionsActivated method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated> event after a page has completed the loading process.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnConnectionsActivated genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated>evento dopo che è stato completato il processo di caricamento di una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated>

trans-unit.source: The method provides a way to add a handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo fornisce un modo per aggiungere un gestore per l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnConnectionsActivated` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagine è possono aggiungere un gestore personalizzato per l'evento aggiungendo un `OnConnectionsActivated` attributo il `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento in una pagina e quindi assegnare un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating"></xref> event to indicate that a page and its controls have loaded, and the process of activating connections can begin.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating"> </xref> evento per indicare che una pagina e i relativi controlli sono stati caricati e che inizia il processo di attivazione delle connessioni.

trans-unit.source: The OnConnectionsActivating method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating> event, which provides developers with a mechanism for programmatically customizing the process of activating connections.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnConnectionsActivating genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating>evento, che fornisce agli sviluppatori un meccanismo per la personalizzazione a livello di codice il processo di attivazione delle connessioni.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnConnectionsActivating` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagine è possono aggiungere un gestore personalizzato per l'evento aggiungendo un `OnConnectionsActivating` attributo il `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento in una pagina e quindi assegnare un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged"></xref> event to indicate that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control has completed the process of switching from one display mode to another on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged"> </xref> evento per indicare che il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo ha completato il processo di passaggio da una modalità di visualizzazione a altra in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The OnDisplayModeChanged method in its base form simply raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnDisplayModeChanged in base modulo genera semplicemente il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data associated with a changed display mode.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento associati alla modalità di visualizzazione modificato.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging"></xref> event to indicate that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control is in the process of switching from one display mode to another on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging"> </xref> evento per indicare che il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo sta per passare da una modalità di visualizzazione a altra in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The OnDisplayModeChanging method in its base form simply raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnDisplayModeChanging in base modulo genera semplicemente il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data associated with a changing display mode.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento associati a una modalità di visualizzazione di modifica.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event, which is the first event in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> evento, che è il primo evento nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> ciclo di vita di controllo.

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method calls the base method, which raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event for the control, and then carries out several preparatory steps, such as ensuring that there is only one instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on a page, and loading personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnInit chiama il metodo di base, che genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>evento per il controllo e quindi esegue diversi passaggi preparatori, ad esempio verificare che sia presente solo un'istanza del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllare in una pagina e il caricamento di dati di personalizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: There is another <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control on the page
trans-unit.target: Un'altra <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo nella pagina

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event, which occurs just before a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control is rendered on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> evento che si verifica poco prima che un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> rendering del controllo in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method calls the base method, which raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event for the control, and then registers several client scripts that are needed on pages that contain Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnPreRender chiama il metodo di base, che genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>Controlla diversi script client che sono necessarie le pagine che contengono le Web part di eventi per il controllo e registri.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged"></xref> event, which occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has either been newly selected or had its selection cleared.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged"> </xref> evento che si verifica dopo un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo è stato appena selezionato o ha cancellato la selezione.

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectedWebPartChanged method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged> event, which is typically a point in time where a developer might want to change the appearance of the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnSelectedWebPartChanged genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged>evento, ovvero in genere un punto nel tempo in cui uno sviluppatore potrebbe voler modificare l'aspetto dell'interfaccia utente (UI).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is selected, the Web Parts control set changes the rendering of the newly selected control.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando un nuovo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo è selezionato, set di controlli Web part viene impostato il rendering del controllo appena selezionato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: After a control's selection is cleared, the rendering is returned to normal.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la selezione di un controllo è deselezionata, il rendering è tornato alla normalità.

trans-unit.source: After a user selects a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control for editing, the OnSelectedWebPartChanged method is called.
trans-unit.target: Dopo che un utente seleziona un determinato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo per la modifica, viene chiamato il metodo OnSelectedWebPartChanged.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: When the user finishes editing the control and closes it, with the result that the control's selection is cleared, the OnSelectedWebPartChanged method is called again.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente ha completato la modifica del controllo e si chiude, con il risultato che la selezione del controllo è deselezionata, viene chiamato nuovamente il metodo OnSelectedWebPartChanged.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref> event, which occurs during the process of changing which <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"> </xref> evento che si verifica durante il processo di modifica del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo attualmente selezionato.

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectedWebPartChanging method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> event, which occurs during the process of changing which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnSelectedWebPartChanging genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>evento che si verifica durante il processo di modifica del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo attualmente selezionato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this method, and the associated event, to provide an opportunity to cancel a process in which the selected control is changing.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo utilizza questo metodo e l'evento associato, per fornire la possibilità di annullare un processo in cui il controllo selezionato in fase di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, the method is called within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A> method, and also within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A> method, to provide a way to cancel the process.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il metodo viene chiamato all'interno del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A>(metodo) e anche all'interno di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A>metodo per fornire un modo per annullare il processo di.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a user clicks the cancel verb on a control that is being edited, the control is no longer selected and any editing changes are not saved, because the OnSelectedWebPartChanging method makes it possible to cancel the editing changes.
trans-unit.target: Se un utente sceglie il verbo di annullamento su un controllo che viene modificato, il controllo non è più selezionato e le modifiche non salvate, in quanto il metodo OnSelectedWebPartChanging rende possibile annullare le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The method is similarly called during the methods that begin and end the process of connecting a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to another control, to enable canceling that process.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il metodo viene chiamato in modo analogo durante i metodi che iniziano e terminano il processo di connessione un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>un altro controllo, per abilitare l'annullamento del processo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> event by adding the `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in declarative page markup, and assigning to the attribute the name of a custom method.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagine è possono creare un gestore personalizzato per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>eventi aggiungendo il `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attributo il `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento nel markup della pagina dichiarativo e l'assegnazione all'attributo del nome di un metodo personalizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the base <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Unload"></xref> event and removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> instance from a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Eleva la base <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Unload"> </xref> eventi e rimuove il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> istanza da una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: Event data associated with the removal of the control.
trans-unit.target: Dati dell'evento associati alla rimozione del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded"></xref> event, which occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has been added to a page.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded"> </xref> evento che si verifica dopo un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo è stato aggiunto a una pagina.

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartAdded method is called during the process of adding a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server control that is added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone) to a page.
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato il metodo OnWebPartAdded durante il processo di aggiunta di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo (o un altro controllo server che viene aggiunto a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona) a una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event by adding the `OnWebPartAdded` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagine è possono creare un gestore personalizzato per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>eventi aggiungendo il `OnWebPartAdded` attributo il `asp:webpartmanager>` elemento e l'assegnazione di un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding"></xref> event, which occurs during the process of adding a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or a server or user control) to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding"> </xref> evento che si verifica durante il processo di aggiunta di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo (o un controllo server o utente) a un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona.

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartAdding method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event to indicate that a control is in the process of being added.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnWebPartAdding genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>evento per indicare che un controllo è in corso l'aggiunta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>

trans-unit.source: The method also provides the option to cancel the adding process.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo fornisce anche l'opzione per annullare il processo di aggiunta.

trans-unit.source: If the control is successfully added, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event follows.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo viene aggiunto correttamente, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>l'evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagina possono fornire un gestore personalizzato per l'evento associato mediante l'aggiunta di `OnWebPartAdding` attributo il `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento in una pagina Web e quindi assegnare un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed"></xref> event to signal that a control has been removed from a page.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed"> </xref> evento per segnalare che un controllo è stato rimosso da una pagina.

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartClosed method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed> event to indicate that a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server or user control) has been successfully closed on a page.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnWebPartClosed genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>evento per indicare che un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo (o altri controlli server o utente) sono stato chiuso correttamente in una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>

trans-unit.source: To close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control means to remove it from a page so that it is not rendered, and also to place it in a special holding object called a page catalog.
trans-unit.target: Per chiudere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo si intende rimuovere da una pagina in modo che non viene eseguito e posizionarlo in un particolare oggetto contenitore definito in un catalogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A page catalog, which corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, maintains references to closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls for each page.
trans-unit.target: In un catalogo, che corrisponde alla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>di controllo, mantiene i riferimenti a chiuso <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli per ogni pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control is declared on a page within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone, users can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add back to the page any controls that were previously closed.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>controllo viene dichiarato in una pagina all'interno di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>zona, gli utenti possono impostare la pagina in modalità di visualizzazione catalogo e aggiungere nuovamente alla pagina tutti i controlli che in precedenza sono stati chiusi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartClosed method provides an opportunity for developers to create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnWebPartClosed fornisce una possibilità per gli sviluppatori di creare un gestore personalizzato per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagine è possono aggiungere un gestore personalizzato per l'evento aggiungendo un `OnWebPartClosed` attributo il `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento in una pagina e quindi assegnare un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.

trans-unit.source: One useful task a developer might carry out in this method is to display a placeholder in place of the closed control, complete with a ToolTip that would inform users how to add the control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: Un'attività utile che uno sviluppatore può eseguire in questo metodo consiste nel visualizzare un segnaposto al posto del controllo chiuso, completare la procedura aggiungere il controllo alla pagina con una descrizione comando che verrebbe informare gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"></xref> event, which occurs during the process of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control being removed from a page.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"> </xref> evento che si verifica durante il processo di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o controllo server viene rimosso da una pagina.

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartClosing method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing> event to indicate that a control is in the process of being closed or removed from a page.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnWebPartClosing genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>evento per indicare che un controllo è in fase di chiusura o rimosso da una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>

trans-unit.source: The method also provides the option to cancel the closing process.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo fornisce anche l'opzione per annullare il processo di chiusura.

trans-unit.source: If the control is successfully removed from the page, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed> event follows.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo viene rimosso correttamente dalla pagina, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>l'evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartClosinging` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagina possono fornire un gestore personalizzato per l'evento associato mediante l'aggiunta di `OnWebPartClosinging` attributo il `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento in una pagina Web e quindi assegnare un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted"></xref> event, which occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has been permanently deleted from a page.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted"> </xref> evento che si verifica dopo un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo è stato eliminato in modo permanente da una pagina.

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartDeleted method is called during the process of deleting a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server control that is added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone) from a page.
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato il metodo OnWebPartDeleted durante il processo di eliminazione di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo (o un altro controllo server che viene aggiunto a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona) da una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted> event by adding the `OnWebPartDeleted` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagine è possono creare un gestore personalizzato per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>eventi aggiungendo il `OnWebPartDeleted` attributo il `asp:webpartmanager>` elemento e l'assegnazione di un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref> event, which indicates that a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or server or user control that is contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone) is in the process of being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"> </xref> evento, che indica che una dinamica <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo (o control server o utente contenuti in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona) è in corso l'eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Only dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be deleted, and when a control is deleted, the control instance is permanently removed from a page and cannot be restored.
trans-unit.target: Solo dinamica <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli possono essere eliminati e, quando viene eliminato un controllo, l'istanza del controllo verrà rimosso definitivamente da una pagina e non può essere ripristinato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are those that are added programmatically, or from a Web Parts catalog, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Dinamica <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli che vengono aggiunti a livello di programmazione, o da un catalogo Web part, a differenza dei controlli statici che sono dichiarati nel markup della pagina Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartDeleting method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> event to indicate that a control is being permanently deleted from its zone.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnWebPartDeleting genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting>evento per indicare che un controllo viene viene eliminato definitivamente dalla relativa area.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting>

trans-unit.source: The method also provides the opportunity to cancel the deleting process.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo fornisce inoltre la possibilità di annullare il processo di eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: If the control is successfully deleted from the page, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted> event follows.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo viene eliminato correttamente, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>l'evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagina possono fornire un gestore personalizzato per l'evento associato mediante l'aggiunta di `OnWebPartDeleting` attributo il `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento in una pagina Web e quindi assegnare un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved"></xref> event, which occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has been moved to a different location on a page.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved"> </xref> evento che si verifica dopo un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo è stato spostato in un percorso diverso in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartMoved method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event at the very end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.MoveWebPart%2A> method, which ensures that the process of moving a control is complete before any code in the event handler runs.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnWebPartMoved genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>evento alla fine del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.MoveWebPart%2A>metodo, che garantisce che il processo di spostamento di un controllo è stato completato prima di qualsiasi codice nell'evento gestore viene eseguito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.MoveWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event is raised when a control is moved within its current zone, or to another zone, and it does not matter whether the movement is done programmatically or by a user dragging the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>evento viene generato quando un controllo viene spostato all'interno della relativa area o in un'altra area e non è importante se lo spostamento viene eseguito a livello di codice o da un utente di trascinare il controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event by adding the `OnWebPartMoved` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagine è possono creare un gestore personalizzato per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>eventi aggiungendo il `OnWebPartMoved` attributo il `asp:webpartmanager>` elemento e l'assegnazione di un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving"></xref> event, which indicates that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server or user control in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone is in the process of being moved.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving"> </xref> evento, che indica che un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o control server o un utente in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona è in corso lo spostamento.

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartMoving method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event, which occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control is being moved within its zone or to another zone.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnWebPartMoving genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>evento che si verifica quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o altro controllo server viene spostato all'interno dell'area o in un'altra area.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: The method also provides the opportunity to cancel the moving process.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo fornisce inoltre la possibilità di annullare il processo di spostamento.

trans-unit.source: If the move is successfully completed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event follows.
trans-unit.target: Se lo spostamento viene completato correttamente, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>l'evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartMoving` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagina possono fornire un gestore personalizzato per l'evento associato mediante l'aggiunta di `OnWebPartMoving` attributo il `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento in una pagina Web e quindi assegnare un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref> event, which occurs after a connection has been established between <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"> </xref> evento che si verifica dopo aver stabilita una connessione tra <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartsConnected method raises its corresponding event at the very end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method, which ensures that the steps necessary to connect two controls are completed before any code in the event handler runs.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento corrispondente alla fine del metodo OnWebPartsConnected il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>metodo, che garantisce che i passaggi necessari per connettere due controlli vengono completati prima che venga eseguito qualsiasi codice nel gestore eventi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method provides programmatic control over the process of creating connections, and the associated event is a convenient point at which to update the user interface (UI) or notify a user that a connection has been established.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo consente di controllare a livello di codice il processo di creazione di connessioni e l'evento associato è un pratico punto in cui aggiornare l'interfaccia utente (UI) o notificare a un utente che sia stata stabilita una connessione.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
